title: sync failed
body:
Hi all,

#### System information

OS & Version: Ubuntu 14, 4cores and 8G memory

And if i restart the geth, it will run smoothly for a while(half an hour or even longer), but then the same problem happen.
It seems that the network is stuck?  This bring me a lot of problem. Because my transactions are sent to this geth, and if this geth can't update to lately, the transactions will failed
Any help will be appreciated.

Hello, had the same problem.
Secure your keys (keystore folder and json)
Uninstall Wallet and Geth

Download Geth 1.7.3
Start geth 1.7.3

Download ethereum Wallet 0.9.1.
Start ethereum Wallet 0.9.1.

Wait until everything is synchronized. This time it should work

Have fun.
If it helped, spend to:
